name: Jewel Match Solitaire Collector's Edition
description:
Due to popular demand we created this enhanced version of Jewel Match Solitaire, the COLLECTOR'S EDITION:
this version features 320 (!) completely NEW levels (different from the regular version) and 18 bonus Solitaire variants, such as Klondike, Spider and Freecell.

The COLLECTOR'S EDITION also features:
  • Strategy Guide on how to successfully solve Solitaire Games.
  • Music Player to select your favourite tune.
  • Exclusive wallpapers, concept art, and more!
Travel across an ancient land and rebuild eight majestic castles. Dozens of unique game play variations mix up the classic Solitaire such as locked and frozen cards, obstacles to remove like vines and wax seals, and many power-ups like wild cards, jokers, and shuffles.

Search every last level for gems and coins to purchase new castle upgrades and power-ups. Jewel Match Solitaire Collector's Edition is the ultimate relaxing Solitaire game!

  • 320 Solitaire levels!
  • 18 additional Solitaire variants such as Klondike, Spider, and Freecell.
  • 8 beautiful castles to build!
  • Loads of game play variations and power-ups.
  • Dozens of Trophies to win.
  • Choose from several card decks.
  • Beautifully relaxing soundtrack.
